info.name: 蒋庆远
info.profile: Qing-Yuan Jiang is currently an Associate Professor at Nanjing University of Science and Technology. He received the B.S. degree and Ph.D degree from the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Nanjing University in 2014 and 2020. In 2024, he joined the School of Compute Science and Engineering, Nanjing University of Science and Technology, as an associate professor. He's research interests are machine learning, multimodal learning.
info.profile_c: 南京理工大学计算机科学与工程学院副教授。2014年毕业于南京大学计算机科学与技术专业，获学士学位。2020年毕业于南京大学计算机科学与技术专业，获博士学位。2020年入职华为技术有限公司。2024年加入南京理工大学计算机科学与工程学院。目前担任IEEE TPAMI、IEEE TIP、ICML、NeurIPS、CVPR、ICCV、IJCAI、AAAI等国际著名期刊/会议审稿人。研究方向主要包括机器学习、多模态学习等。
